titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Christian Rural Fellowship is a nondenominational body with several state branches that is geared towards the understanding and appreciation of religious and spiritual values of agriculture and rural life. The Christian Rural Fellowship Bulletin is a non-denominational journal on rural ministry that supplements the publications of the Rural Workersâ€™ Fellowship. Its stated purpose is: "To promote Christian ideals for agriculture and rural life; to interpret the spiritual and religious values which inhere in the process of agriculture and the relationships of rural life; to magnify and dignify the rural church; to provide a means of fellowship and cooperation among rural agencies."

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of monthly issues of the Christian Rural Fellowship Bulletin, 1935-1949.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
